column5: It's Independence Day for my  Sudden brethren. You all have the greatest, safest, happy day!
Have a great one guys and gals. Happy Independence Day to you all.
You may look different, Play different, be different, but honestly, I would not have ANYBODY as my neighbor than the USA.  Happy Independance Day.  Thanks for being good neighbors
Thank y'all very much!  I'm thinkin' aboot starting a petition to annex Canada into the U.S., already thought up a name... New Michigan!!!
Thanks Roy  Holdfast I feel the same way about our northern neighbors.  Dawg keep granny's medicine away from the fireworks  Have a good one!
Glen, we KNOW about the "PLAN", do not try it! We may look like peaceful friendly types up here but its all an act!   Happy July 4th!  Stay away!

Ya Dawg...watch it eh !  We still got a couple of rusty muskets left over from the last time and our Navy has a leaky boat or two...be afraid...be very afraid  ...  Kidding aside...Have a good holiday ...Y'all !!!
Happy Independence Day  And always remember, if you drink a fifth on the fourth, you won't come fourth on the fifth!!!  Joey
Thanks for the well wishes and the thoughts it is an important day today being a day that we remember that freedom is a right that needs to be protected.   Art
Yes indeed! Have a great day today folks and enjoy all that living in the US of A has to offer!
Happy July 4th. My son is a dual citizen and is down in Michigan right now celebrating and just for him they have a little celebration on Canada Day as well.
Cheers folks, I am having a beer for ya as we speak ...umm it's Canadian beer though..you know the kind with actual booze in it
